content.rendered:
Directed by Sidhartha Siva.

Written by Sidhartha Siva.

Cast Nivin Pauly(Sakhavu Krishnan / Krishna Kumar). Aishwarya Rajesh(Janaki Krishnan). Aparna Gopinath(Krishnan’s Daughter). Binu Pappu(Eerali Prabhakaran). Sreenivasan(Doctor). Althaf Salim(Mahesh). Tony Luke(The Manager). Nishanth Sagar(Tony Manakkal). Gayathri Suresh(Aishwarya). Santhosh Keezhattoor(Senthil). Muhammed Musthafa(Basheer (as Musthafa)). Rakendu(Eldho). Sudheesh(Dasan). Aliyar(Comrade). V.K. Prakash(Mathews). Baiju(Garudan Kankani) . Shelly Kishore(Maya). Prem Kumar(Comrade). Sooraj S. Kurup(Rajeev). Mary(Nurse). Anjali Nair(Suja (as Anjali Aneesh Upasana)). Seema G. Nair(Janaki’s Mother). Chali Pala(K.T. Devasia). Renji Panicker(Kuriyachan). Krishna Prasad(Advocate). Kalabhavan Rahman(Tea Shop Owner). Maniyanpilla Raju(Rajan). Angel Shijoy(Aparna Gopinath (voice)). Sreelakshmi(Krishna Kumar’s Mother). V. Suresh Thampanoor(Janaki’s Father). Baiju V.K.(Police Officer)

Language Malayalam.

Producer Rakesh Bahuleyan.

Production Universal Cinema.
